abstract: Allied Pilots Assn says American Airline pilots it represents have agreed to five-year contract, which will pave way for merger of airline with US Airways.
lead_paragraph: The deal provides a substantial salary increase, though some union members have criticized it for failing to match the terms offered by Delta Air Lines.
snippet: The deal provides a substantial salary increase, though some union members have criticized it for failing to match the terms offered by Delta Air Lines.

headline.main: Pilots Union Approves Contract With Airline
headline.print_headline: Pilots Union Approves Contract With Airline
